recipe.title: Mediterranean Lentil Salad Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup ; yellow bell pepper, chopped ; (50 g)
½ cup ; cherry tomato, halved ; (100 g)
½ cup ; fresh parsley, chopped ; (20 g)

steps.step: In a large mason jar, add the olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, garlic, pepper, and salt. Stir or swirl to combine.
Add the bell pepper, chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, lentils, and parsley and screw on the lid.
Store in the refrigerator until ready to eat, up to 5 days
Give the mason jar a good shake to mix and use a fork or spoon to stir as needed.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a large mason jar, add the olive oil, red wine vinegar, lemon juice, garlic, pepper, and salt.
Add the bell pepper, chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, lentils, and parsley and screw on the lid.
Store in the refrigerator until ready to eat, up to 5 days
Give the mason jar a good shake to mix and use a fork or spoon to stir as needed.
